Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to answer truthfully under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Was the visa officer's decision to dismiss the application based on misrepresentation reasonable?
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Principal applicant admitted to submitting fraudulent test results
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Submission of false documents inducing error in immigration process
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Submission of forged English test report that could induce error
Crimes.Application_Factor: Points calculation for permanent residency affected by false test
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Submission of forged English language proficiency test
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant’s credibility undermined by admission of fraud
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge via judicial review on grounds of unreasonableness
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of review applied in judicial review

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Was the visa officer's dismissal of the application for permanent residence based on misrepresentation reasonable?
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Principal applicant submitted forged IELTS test report
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Misrepresentation through submission of false document affecting eligibility
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Initial submission of forged test, despite later valid results
Crimes.Application_Error: Use of fraudulent test results in points-based application
Crimes.Application_Factor: Reliance on false documentation for language proficiency requirement
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Submission of a forged IELTS test report by the principal applicant in 2005
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Verification and authenticity of test documentation
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Applicants challenged decision through proper legal channel
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant’s credibility compromised due to falsified evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Judicial review challenging reasonableness of decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Scope of judicial review over administrative decisions
